title: Mcbbs的bug为什么这么多？
author: 细菌XiJu
txt_content: 为什么我有时候点击签到然后没反应？？？还有我那个新人任务的上传头像任务为什么一直没有显示已完成，我都已经换了5,6个头像了。

replies.author: 赶紧睡觉觉
replies.txt_content: 点击签到应该是网不好吧，任务的话有的要进去界面再点完成

replies.author: RarityEG
replies.txt_content: 好玩，刚连不上论坛了，换手机端菜解决…

replies.author: lf840924
replies.txt_content: 特性特性特性
老bug了 西瓜酒好

replies.author: xiyanxinnian
replies.txt_content: 记住，这不是bug，这是特性！！[#滑稽]

replies.author: FaceTime
replies.txt_content: 习惯就好了

replies.author: BakaXD
replies.txt_content: 理解一下, MCBBS毕竟不盈利啊
别问，问就是特性

replies.author: irocksir
replies.txt_content: bug多，升级慢

replies.author: 二酱
replies.txt_content: 这叫特性

replies.author: 可怜的孤魂野鬼
replies.txt_content: 那叫特性，我也领不了

replies.author: Earfreet
replies.txt_content: 把宅魂拖出来打一顿就好了

replies.author: DIHowe
replies.txt_content: 这叫特性。。。

replies.author: zzfy
replies.txt_content: 这不过是特性罢了

replies.author: 蓝颜相遇
replies.txt_content: 注意这叫特性不叫bug

replies.author: wz2957531723
replies.txt_content: 都是特性

replies.author: Evil_Zed
replies.txt_content: 特性，这叫特性

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content: 我记得以前这论坛可没这么多bug，不知道是哪次更新开始bug就多起来了。

replies.author: 小猫不喝水
replies.txt_content:
泥潭老特性，所以自动签到。
你可以@专门搞开发的12岁小萝莉gameteam，但他一定会回答“可以，但没必要”

replies.author: hyzgzz
replies.txt_content: 你的浏览器不支持flash或者插件啥的

replies.author: 若轩233
replies.txt_content: 这是不是bug，是特性！

replies.author: 阴阳尼玛
replies.txt_content: 别说BUG，这叫特性，记好咯

replies.author: louyukai
replies.txt_content: 众所周知MCBBS特性很多

replies.author: ww3623
replies.txt_content: 这叫特性 特性！

replies.author: 追逐丶
replies.txt_content: 这不过是特性罢了 就是这个样的
巧了，头像的任务一样

replies.author: 小萌新chimei
replies.txt_content: 我也一直没完成那个任务，这应该是特有的特性

replies.author: src_resources
replies.txt_content: 其实世上本没有特性，出的bug多了，便成了特性。

replies.author: oasidoashf
replies.txt_content: 我也是这样  没办法

replies.author: Moming17
replies.txt_content: 那叫特性，我跟你一样换了好多个头像了

replies.author: thltutlbngik
replies.txt_content: 新手任务2感觉这辈子可能都完成不了....以后学好http去帮mcbbs改bug（滑稽）

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content: bug多可能是一种日常了吧 系内

replies.author: 殆辰羽_
replies.txt_content: 特性游戏的论坛当然要有特性了

replies.author: setnightmare
replies.txt_content: 泥潭特色x(你才色

replies.author: 可乐菌KeLe
replies.txt_content:
